00024 #ifndef __L4_KTRACE_H__
00025 #define __L4_KTRACE_H__
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00028 
00029 #define LOG_EVENT_CONTEXT_SWITCH   0  
00032 #define LOG_EVENT_IPC_SHORTCUT     1  
00035 #define LOG_EVENT_IRQ_RAISED       2  
00038 #define LOG_EVENT_TIMER_IRQ        3  
00041 #define LOG_EVENT_THREAD_EX_REGS   4  
00045 #define LOG_EVENT_MAX_EVENTS      16  
00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00056   l4_umword_t tracebuffer0;
00058   l4_umword_t size0;
00060   l4_umword_t version0;
00062   l4_umword_t tracebuffer1;
00064   l4_umword_t size1;
00066   l4_umword_t version1;
00068   l4_umword_t logevents[LOG_EVENT_MAX_EVENTS];
00069 
00071   l4_umword_t scaler_tsc_to_ns;
00073   l4_umword_t scaler_tsc_to_us;
00075   l4_umword_t scaler_ns_to_tsc;
00076 
00078   l4_umword_t cnt_context_switch;
00080   l4_umword_t cnt_addr_space_switch;
00082   l4_umword_t cnt_shortcut_failed;
00084   l4_umword_t cnt_shortcut_success;
00086   l4_umword_t cnt_irq;
00088   l4_umword_t cnt_ipc_long;
00090   l4_umword_t cnt_page_fault;
00093   l4_umword_t cnt_io_fault;
00095   l4_umword_t cnt_task_create;
00097   l4_umword_t schedule;
00098 
00099 } l4_tracebuffer_status_t;
00100 
00107 L4_INLINE l4_tracebuffer_status_t *
00108 fiasco_tbuf_get_status(void);
00109 
00116 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t
00117 fiasco_tbuf_get_status_phys(void);
00118 
00126 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00127 fiasco_tbuf_log(const char *text);
00128 
00140 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00141 fiasco_tbuf_log_3val(const char *text, unsigned v1, unsigned v2, unsigned v3);
00142 
00150 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00151 fiasco_tbuf_log_binary(const unsigned char *data);
00152 
00157 L4_INLINE void
00158 fiasco_tbuf_clear(void);
00159 
00164 L4_INLINE void
00165 fiasco_tbuf_dump(void);

00170 L4_INLINE void
00171 fiasco_timer_disable(void);
00172

00178 fiasco_timer_enable(void);

00180 /*****************************************************************************
00181  *** Implementation
00182  *****************************************************************************/
00183 
00184 L4_INLINE l4_tracebuffer_status_t *
00185 fiasco_tbuf_get_status(void)
00186 {
00187   l4_tracebuffer_status_t *tbuf;
00188   asm("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : "=a" (tbuf) : "0" (0));
00189   return tbuf;
00190 }
00191 
00192 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t
00193 fiasco_tbuf_get_status_phys(void)
00194 {
00195   l4_addr_t tbuf_phys;
00196   asm("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : "=a" (tbuf_phys) : "0" (5));
00197   return tbuf_phys;
00198 }
00199 
00200 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00201 fiasco_tbuf_log(const char *text)
00202 {
00203   l4_umword_t offset;
00204   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al"
00205         : "=a" (offset)
00206         : "a" (1), "d" (text));
00207   return offset;
00208 }
00209 
00210 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00211 fiasco_tbuf_log_3val(const char *text, unsigned v1, unsigned v2, unsigned v3)
00212 {
00213   l4_umword_t offset;
00214   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al"
00215         : "=a" (offset)
00216         : "a" (4), "d" (text), "c" (v1), "S" (v2), "D" (v3));
00217   return offset;
00218 }
00219 
00220 L4_INLINE void
00221 fiasco_tbuf_clear(void)
00222 {
00223   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (2));
00224 }
00225 
00226 L4_INLINE void
00227 fiasco_tbuf_dump(void)
00228 {
00229   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (3));
00230 }
00231 
00232 L4_INLINE void
00233 fiasco_timer_disable(void)
00234 {
00235   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (6));
00236 }
00237 
00238 L4_INLINE void
00239 fiasco_timer_enable(void)
00240 {
00241   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (7));
00242 }
00243 
00244 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00245 fiasco_tbuf_log_binary(const unsigned char *data)
00246 {
00247   l4_umword_t offset;
00248   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al"
00249                : "=a" (offset)
00250                : "a" (8), "d" (data));
00251   return offset;
00252 }
00253 
00254 #endif
